description: Ms. codex. Title from inscription mentioning a price on the pastedown of the lower cover. Physical description: 9 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink (professional hand). Cream paper, glossy, with laid and chain lines visible ; frame-ruled. Several inscriptions on fol. 112b-113a. Origin: According to colophon, copy completed in 1083 H. (fol. 125a). Beginning as extant: ولا يجوز اداؤها الا بنية مقارنة لعزل الواجب او الاداء ومن تصدق بجميع ما له سقطت ... باب الزكوة السوايم السايمة التى تكتفى بالرعي Explicit: ولا مولى الموالى الّا عند عدمهم وان كان له موالى اعتقوه فهى باطلة تمت الكتاب بعون الله الملك الوهّاب
author: Mawṣilī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Maḥmūd, 1202 or 1203-1284
abstract: Acephalous and defective copy of a compendium of Ḥanafite law and jurisprudence.
extent: 125 leaves: paper ; 183 x 130 (115 x 85) mm. bound to 183 x 140 mm.
provenance: Acquired by Robert Garrett from Brill, Leyden, 1900.
dlme_provenance_en: Acquired by Robert Garrett from Brill, Leyden, 1900.
creator: Mawṣilī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Maḥmūd, 1202 or 1203-1284
موصلي، عبد الله بن محمود

subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers, with dark brown leather edges. Badly damaged.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
